LOC_T *  locout,

double  cubic_iac 
) [static]

Create transpose of ray tracing operator from locin to locout using cubic influence function that can reproduce piston/tip/tilt.

00207     loc_create_map_npad(locin,2);

00210     int ix,iy;

00214     const double dx_in1 = 1./locin->dx;
00215     const double dx_in2 = scale*dx_in1;
00216     displacex = (displacex-locin->map->ox)*dx_in1;
00217     displacey = (displacey-locin->map->oy)*dx_in1;
00218     const double *px=locout->locx;
00219     const double *py=locout->locy;
00220     long iphi;
00221     //-1 because we count from 1 in the map.
00222     long (*map)[locin->map->nx]
00223     =(long(*)[locin->map->ny])(locin->map->p);
00224     //cubic
00225     double fx[4],fy[4];
00226     const double cubicn=1./(1.+2.*cubic_iac);
00227     const double c0=1*cubicn;
00228     const double c1=(4*cubic_iac-2.5)*cubicn;
00229     const double c2=(1.5-3*cubic_iac)*cubicn;
00230     const double c3=(2*cubic_iac-0.5)*cubicn;
00231     const double c4=(0.5-cubic_iac)*cubicn;
00232     double dplocx0, dplocy0;
00233     long *bp,*bi;
00234     double *bx;
00235     long nzmax=locout->nloc*16;

00237   
00238     bp=hback->p;
00239     bi=hback->i;
00240     bx=hback->x;
00241     long count=0;
00242     const int nmapx3=locin->map->nx-3;
00243     const int nmapy3=locin->map->ny-3;
00244     for(iloc=0; iloc<locout->nloc; iloc++){
00245     bp[iloc]=count;
00246     if(ampout && fabs(ampout[iloc])<EPS)
00247         continue;
00248     if(count+17>nzmax){
00249         nzmax*=2;
00250         spsetnzmax(hback, nzmax);
00251         bp=hback->p;
00252         bi=hback->i;
00253         bx=hback->x;
00254     }
00255 
00256     dplocy=myfma(py[iloc],dx_in2,displacey);
00257     dplocx=myfma(px[iloc],dx_in2,displacex);
00258 
00259     SPLIT(dplocx,dplocx,nplocx);
00260     SPLIT(dplocy,dplocy,nplocy);
00261     dplocy0=1.-dplocy;
00262     dplocx0=1.-dplocx;
00263 
00264     fx[0]=dplocx0*dplocx0*(c3+c4*dplocx0);
00265     fx[1]=c0+dplocx*dplocx*(c1+c2*dplocx);
00266     fx[2]=c0+dplocx0*dplocx0*(c1+c2*dplocx0);
00267     fx[3]=dplocx*dplocx*(c3+c4*dplocx);
00268         
00269     fy[0]=dplocy0*dplocy0*(c3+c4*dplocy0);
00270     fy[1]=c0+dplocy*dplocy*(c1+c2*dplocy);
00271     fy[2]=c0+dplocy0*dplocy0*(c1+c2*dplocy0);
00272     fy[3]=dplocy*dplocy*(c3+c4*dplocy); 
00273 
00274     if(nplocy<1 || nplocy>nmapy3 || nplocx<1 || nplocx>nmapx3){
00275         continue;
00276     }
00277     for(iy=nplocy-1; iy<nplocy+3; iy++){
00278         for(ix=nplocx-1; ix<nplocx+3; ix++){
00279         iphi=map[iy][ix];
00280         double weight=fx[ix-nplocx+1]*fy[iy-nplocy+1];
00281         if(iphi && weight>EPS){
00282             bi[count]=iphi-1;
00283             bx[count]=weight;
00284             count++;
00285         }
00286         }
00287     }
00288     }//for
00289     bp[locout->nloc]=count;
00290     spclean(hback);
00291     spsetnzmax(hback, count);
00292     if(missing>0){
00293     warning("%d points not covered by input screen\n", missing);
00294     }
00295     return hback;
00296 }

dsp* mkh ( LOC_T *  locin,
LOC_T *  locout,
const double *  ampout,
double  displacex,
double  displacey,
double  scale,
int  cubic,
double  cubic_iac 
)

Create ray tracing operator from coordinate locin to locout.

Locin is required to be evenly spaced.

If vector Pin is defined on locin, Pout is defined on locout, H=mkh(locin, locout, ...), Pout=H*Pin does the bilinear interpolation.

If cubic is 1, will call mkh_cubic to produce a cubical interpolation.

A cubic influence function that can reproduce piston/tip/tilt is coined by Ellerbroek to model the piezostack DM actuator. The influence has the form

where is the same as the grid spacing, and is the influence function defined in the normalized coordinates

where c is the nearest neighbor coupling frequency. The leading coefficient is to normalize the influence function so that it sums to 1. 

00063                                  {
00064     dsp *Hb=mkhb(locin, locout, ampout,displacex, displacey, scale, cubic, cubic_iac);
00065     dsp *H=sptrans(Hb);
00066     spfree(Hb);
00067     return H;
00068 }

Create transpose of mkh() result. 

00074                                   {
00075     if(cubic){
00076     return mkhb_cubic(locin, locout, ampout, displacex, displacey, scale, cubic_iac);
00077     }
00078   
00079     loc_create_map_npad(locin,1);//will only do once and save in locin.
00080     dsp *hback;
00081     double dplocx, dplocy;
00082     int nplocx, nplocy, nplocx1, nplocy1;
00083     long iloc;
00084     //int missing=0;
00085     const int wrapx = locin->map->nx-1;
00086     const int wrapy = locin->map->ny-1;
00087     const double dx_in1 = 1./locin->dx;
00088     const double dx_in2 = scale*dx_in1;
00089     displacex = (displacex-locin->map->ox)*dx_in1;
00090     displacey = (displacey-locin->map->oy)*dx_in1;
00091     const double *px=locout->locx;
00092     const double *py=locout->locy;
00093 #if ONLY_FULL==1
00094     long iphi1,iphi2,iphi3,iphi4;
00095 #else
00096     long iphi;
00097 #endif
00098     //-1 because we count from 1 in the map.
00099     long (*map)[locin->map->nx]
00100     =(long(*)[locin->map->nx])(locin->map->p);
00101     long *bp,*bi;
00102     double *bx;
00103   
00104     //transpose of hfor
00105     long nzmax=locout->nloc*4;
00106     hback = spnew(locin->nloc, locout->nloc, nzmax);
00107     bp=hback->p;
00108     bi=hback->i;
00109     bx=hback->x;
00110     long count=0;
00111     double weight;
00112     //double *phiin0=phiin-1;
00113     for(iloc=0; iloc<locout->nloc; iloc++){
00114     bp[iloc]=count;//column index
00115     if(ampout && fabs(ampout[iloc])<EPS)
00116         continue;
00117     if(count+5>nzmax){
00118         nzmax*=2;
00119         spsetnzmax(hback, nzmax);
00120         bp=hback->p;
00121         bi=hback->i;
00122         bx=hback->x;
00123     }
00124     dplocy=myfma(py[iloc],dx_in2,displacey);
00125     dplocx=myfma(px[iloc],dx_in2,displacex);
00126 
00127     SPLIT(dplocx,dplocx,nplocx);
00128     SPLIT(dplocy,dplocy,nplocy);
00129 
00130     if(nplocx<0||nplocx>=wrapx||nplocy<0||nplocy>=wrapy){
00131         continue;
00132     }
00133     nplocx1=nplocx+1;
00134     nplocy1=nplocy+1;
00135 #if ONLY_FULL == 1 //only proceed if all four points exist. preferred
00136     iphi1=map[nplocy][nplocx];
00137     iphi2=map[nplocy][nplocx1];
00138     iphi3=map[nplocy1][nplocx];
00139     iphi4=map[nplocy1][nplocx1];
00140     if(iphi1-- && iphi2-- && iphi3-- && iphi4--){
00141         if((weight=(1.-dplocx)*(1.-dplocy))>EPS){
00142         bi[count]=iphi1;
00143         bx[count]=weight;
00144         count++;
00145         }
00146         if((weight=(dplocx)*(1.-dplocy))>EPS){
00147         bi[count]=iphi2;
00148         bx[count]=weight;
00149         count++;
00150         }
00151         if((weight=(1.-dplocx)*(dplocy))>EPS){
00152         bi[count]=iphi3;
00153         bx[count]=weight;
00154         count++;
00155         }
00156         if((weight=(dplocx)*(dplocy))>EPS){
00157         bi[count]=iphi4;
00158         bx[count]=weight;
00159         count++;
00160         }
00161     }
00162 #else   
00163     if((iphi=map[nplocy][nplocx]) && (weight=(1.-dplocx)*(1.-dplocy))>EPS){
00164         bi[count]=iphi-1;
00165         bx[count]=weight;
00166         count++;
00167     }
00168     if((iphi=map[nplocy][nplocx1]) && (weight=(dplocx)*(1.-dplocy))>EPS ){
00169         bi[count]=iphi-1;
00170         bx[count]=weight;
00171         count++;
00172     }
00173     if((iphi=map[nplocy1][nplocx]) && (weight=(1.-dplocx)*(dplocy))>EPS){
00174         bi[count]=iphi-1;
00175         bx[count]=weight;
00176         count++;
00177     }
00178     if((iphi=map[nplocy1][nplocx1]) && (weight=(dplocx)*(dplocy))>EPS){
00179         bi[count]=iphi-1;
00180         bx[count]=weight;
00181         count++;
00182     }
00183 #endif
00184     /*if(renorm && bp[iloc]<count){
00185         double sumwt=0;
00186         for(int ic=bp[iloc]; ic<count; ic++){
00187         sumwt+=bx[ic];
00188         }
00189         if(fabs(sumwt)>EPS && fabs(sumwt-1.)>EPS){
00190         sumwt=1./sumwt;
00191         for(int ic=bp[iloc]; ic<count; ic++){
00192             bx[ic]*=sumwt;
00193         }   
00194         }
00195         }*/
00196     }
00197     bp[locout->nloc]=count;
00198     spclean(hback);
00199     spsetnzmax(hback, count);
00200     return hback;
00201 }

dsp* mkhbin1d ( dmat *  xin,
dmat *  xout 
)

Create a matrix to bin from xin to xout using bilinear interpolation.

xin and xout should be 1-d arrays of coordinates. We require the coordinates to order incrementally monotonically. 

00303                                     {
00304     if(xin->ny!=1 || xout->ny!=1){
00305     error("We require both xin and xout to be only one column\n");
00306     }
00307     int iout=0;
00308     dsp *hbin=spnew(xout->nx, xin->nx, xin->nx*2);
00309     int count=0;
00310     for(int iin=0; iin<xin->nx; iin++){
00311     hbin->p[iin]=count;
00312     double ixin=xin->p[iin];
00313     while(iout+1<xout->nx && xout->p[iout+1]<ixin){
00314         iout++;
00315     }
00316     if(xout->p[iout]>ixin || (iout+1==xout->nx && xout->p[iout]<ixin)){//outside of the area.
00317         hbin->i[count]=iout;
00318         hbin->x[count]=1;
00319         count++;
00320     }else{//within the area
00321         if(iout+1==xout->nx){
00322         error("This shouldn't happen\n");
00323         }
00324         double wt=(ixin-xout->p[iout])/(xout->p[iout+1]-xout->p[iout]);
00325         hbin->i[count]=iout;
00326         hbin->x[count]=1.-wt;
00327         count++;
00328         hbin->i[count]=iout+1;
00329         hbin->x[count]=wt;
00330         count++;
00331     }
00332     }
00333     hbin->p[xin->nx]=count;
00334     return hbin;
00335 }
